item.paragraph:
2020-09-02
# Chief Complaint
No complaints.
# History of Present Illness
Ara96 is a 71 year-old non-hispanic white female.
# Social History
Patient is married. Patient is an active smoker and is an alcoholic. Patient identifies as bisexual.
Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background. Patient has completed some college courses. Patient currently has Medicare.
# Allergies
No Known Allergies.
# Medications
No Active Medications.
# Assessment and Plan
## Plan
Patient was given the following immunizations: influenza, seasonal, injectable, preservative free, td (adult) preservative free.
